column5: On the first day of ice fishing my true love gave to me , A BIG PATCH OF ICE ..................
On the second day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 2 BROOK TROUT AND A BIG PATCH OF ICE...
5 ice picks
Wait, let's get this started right. There are not enough syllables there to fit the tune. Either change the lyrics or change the conventional tune.
On the 3rd day of Ice Fishing, the temperature went up to 70, the ice & snow melted, the flowers bloomed and winter was over.......YAYYYY
Dose'nt "a partridge in a pear tree" rhyme with a BIG PATCH OF ICE ........................

On the fourth day of ice fishing i have to some how get my true love to give us the cold weather back so we can keep singing the twelve days of ice fishing ................. This is not going to be easy to recap ...........
Can you change that to 5 Bruce..............lol

How about this Roy. Only 9 days left so I stopped there.   On the first day of ice fishing my true love gave to me a mustang floater suit. On the second day of ice fishing my true love gave to me 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the third day of ice fishing my true love gave to me 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the fourth day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the fifth day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 5 jigging rods, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the sixth day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 6 inches of ice, 5 jigging rods, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the seventh day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 7 shiny spoons, 6 inches of ice, 5 jigging rods, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the eighth day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 8 buds a fishing, 7 shiny spoons, 6 inches of ice, 5 jigging rods, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit. On the ninth day of ice fishing my true love gave to me, 9 jumbo perch, 8 buds a fishing, 7 shiny spoons, 6 inches of ice, 5 jigging rods, a 4" auger, 3 dozen minnows, 2 ice picks, and a mustang floater suit.
Nice! But can that 4 inch auger cut though 18" of ice?

Yep, 4" is the radius of the blades, not the length of the auger. The smaller the blades (providing they are sharp) the easier it is to cut. I was given a 10" manual auger by a friend. Cut 2 holes and you are finished.
I know, I'm just messing with you.
Where are you gonna find 18" of ice by Christmas? Only the members WAYYYYYYY up North will have that.
6" for 3 days.
come on we got to finish this ..............
I think its the Bob and Doug Mackenzie version.   On the 6th day of christmas my true love gave to me a 6 pound lake trout.
On the first day of Christmas my true love gave to me, A big patch of Clear, Blue, Ice.......
And on the second day of ice fishing .. we drank it ... lol
nice!!! did ya avoid the yellow stain?
I hear ya, But i'm still trying figure out what F,F,F,A.....Means  :unsure:
Fishing Fun For All but what ever you do don't drink the yellow stain
